review: I have been dreaming about driving and eating for the longest time! I just couldn't figure out how to accomplish both things at the same time.I was actually afraid my airbag would deploy and ruin my cup of coffee... So what to do? I ended up disconnecting my airbag and now I'm safe to eat, drink or even read a book and puty feet up while I'm driving! Best idea ever!!!
productTitle: Zone Tech Car Laptop and Food Steering Wheel Tray (gray)
